name: Cold Calls
firstArt: My team and I are happy to take on all the responsibilities, from finding leads to scheduling appointments with them, thus leaving you time to deal with other important matters.
secondArt: Can you share your experience with cold calling? Have you done it before? If yes, what was the result? By the way, our cold callers are native speakers and US based. We can create multi-channel outreach for different types of audience. From our experience, the best way is to create a complex sales process rather than keep it simple with one channel for the outreach. As a cold calling has to be warmed in advance. So we can reach via Email and Linkedln along with calling.We create outbound campaigns that actually work! Our aim is to ensure you reach the right audience and get the highest deliverability/conversion rates possible – This results in more business and more importantly more revenue for you.Our team works on various factors that affect a successful outbound campaign – We ensure you aren’t hitting spam filters by improving your domain’s deliverability. From there we make sure valid contact details are acquired and then pair that with an amazing copy to win you as much business as possible. You can see the improvements with the reports we send weekly.We are trusted by companies across the globe to win them more business – We specialize in various industries and have done bespoke campaigns in most industries/verticals. Leave your outbound campaign to the experts!We're a company located in Ukraine with employees all around the world. Despite the war in our country, our team is safe and ready to work with you, providing the best possible result.Please drop me a message back to arrange a consultation call – We can discuss your project further and give you a better idea about how Cliqbird works.
